name: 1-to-2 DEMUX
description: Create a 1-to-2 demultiplexer: route data input to one of two outputs based on select signal
fullDescription: The demultiplexer (DEMUX) is the opposite of a MUX. It takes one data input and routes it to one of multiple outputs based on a select signal. A 1-to-2 DEMUX has one data input (D), one select input (S), and two outputs (Y0, Y1). When S=0, Y0=D and Y1=0; when S=1, Y0=0 and Y1=D. DEMUXes are used for data distribution, memory address decoding, and signal routing in digital systems.
